ğŸ“† Just over a year ago ğŸ’” Cancer claimed another one of lifeâ€™s goodâ€™ens, and we lost a special man ğŸ¥¹ A father, a father in law and a gramps ğŸ’™ He was full of life, kind, happy go lucky and had a bucket list of things that he never got to experience ğŸª One of them was to climb the o2 ğŸ‰ Today is his birthday, he loved get togethers, especially with family âœ”ï¸ So today in his memory, we came together and ticked this one off the list for him ğŸ™ğŸ¼ The world changes from year to year, our lives change day to day, but the memories we carry, stay with us forever

ğŸ‰ Yesterday marked my 7th anniversary at Positive Lending ğŸš˜ Just over 7 years ago I was sat in Fleet services with my then manager and still good friend Jaxon Stevens CeMAP about to meet Positiveâ€™s owner Paul McGonigle ğŸ«±ğŸ¼ğŸ«²ğŸ½ To cut a long story short, 45 minutes later I was sold, we were shaking hands and I accepted the job ğŸ¤© And I havenâ€™t looked back since ğŸŒ A lot has changed since I joined, major world, industry and personal events ğŸ‘¨ğŸ¼ğŸ¦³ And Iâ€™m definitely a lot greyer ğŸ‘ŠğŸ¼ But the consistent is I have a job I enjoy, I work with some fantastic people in an amazing industry and most importantly the company ethos and culture I signed up to 7 years ago has remained consistent and committed to being the very best ğŸ’™ Thank you to everyone for their congratulatory comments and the overwhelming amount of kind messages sliding into my DMs ğŸ¥° And a big thank you to everyone past and present who have made the past 7 years at Positive Lending so enjoyable
